statements: SELECT * FROM research_library;
SELECT title, author FROM research_library ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_library WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT title FROM research_library WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, publication_date FROM research_library ORDER BY author ASC, publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM research_library WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT id, title, author FROM research_library WHERE publication_date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM research_library WHERE author='Jane Smith' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM research_library WHERE title LIKE '%data%' ORDER BY author ASC, publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, author, abstract FROM research_library WHERE abstract IS NOT NULL ORDER BY author ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE research_type = 'Science';
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT author_name FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_title, project_description FROM research_projects ORDER BY research_project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT publication_title, author_name FROM publications WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM publications p JOIN research_projects r ON p.research_project_id = r.research_project_id;
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE research_type = 'Experimental' ORDER BY project_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT title, author FROM publications WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_id, title, author, published_date, abstract FROM publications WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author, published_date FROM publications ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_publications JOIN research_projects ON project_publications.project_id = research_projects.project_id;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT title, author FROM publications ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name FROM research_projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT publication_id, title, author FROM publications INNER JOIN project_publications ON publications.publication_id = project_publications.publication_id WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT publication_id, title FROM publications WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Publications;
SELECT title, authors, publication_date FROM Publications WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, authors, journal FROM Publications WHERE journal LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT publication_id, title, authors, publication_date, project_id FROM Publications WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT title, abstract, keywords FROM Publications WHERE keywords @> ARRAY['research', 'science'];
SELECT title, authors, publication_date FROM Publications WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE area_of_expertise @> ARRAY['machine learning']
SELECT project_title, start_date, end_date, researchers FROM Projects WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY start_date
SELECT full_name, email, affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation ILIKE '%university%'
SELECT keyword, description FROM Keywords ORDER BY keyword ASC
SELECT * FROM ResearchProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ResearchProjects WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT publication_title, publication_year FROM Literature ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_affiliation = 'University';
SELECT * FROM ProjectLiterature JOIN Literature ON ProjectLiterature.publication_id = Literature.publication_id;
SELECT * FROM ResearcherProjects JOIN ResearchProjects ON ResearcherProjects.project_id = ResearchProjects.project_id

SELECT ResearchProjects.project_name, Researchers.researcher_name FROM ResearchProjects JOIN ResearcherProjects ON ResearchProjects.project_id = ResearcherProjects.project_id JOIN Researchers ON Researchers.researcher_id = ResearcherProjects.researcher_id
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ResearchProjects WHERE researcher_id = 1

SELECT publication_title, publication_year, researcher_name FROM Literature JOIN ProjectLiterature ON Literature.publication_id = ProjectLiterature.publication_id JOIN ResearcherProjects ON ProjectLiterature.project_id = ResearcherProjects.project_id JOIN Researchers ON Researchers.researcher_id = ResearcherProjects.researcher_id
SELECT * FROM ResearchProjects WHERE project_id = 1
